38namespace webrtc {
39namespace {
40constexpr int kVp8ErrorPropagationTh = 30;
41// vpx_decoder.h documentation indicates decode deadline is time in us, with
42// "Set to zero for unlimited.", but actual implementation requires this to be
43// a mode with 0 meaning allow delay and 1 not allowing it.
44constexpr long kDecodeDeadlineRealtime = 1; // NOLINT
45
46const char kVp8PostProcArmFieldTrial[] = "WebRTC-VP8-Postproc-Config-Arm";
47const char kVp8PostProcFieldTrial[] = "WebRTC-VP8-Postproc-Config";
48
49#if defined(WEBRTC_ARCH_ARM) || defined(WEBRTC_ARCH_ARM64) || \
50 defined(WEBRTC_ANDROID)
51constexpr bool kIsArm = true;
52#else
53constexpr bool kIsArm = false;
54#endif
55
56absl::optional<LibvpxVp8Decoder::DeblockParams> DefaultDeblockParams() {
57 return LibvpxVp8Decoder::DeblockParams(/*max_level=*/8,
58 /*degrade_qp=*/60,
59 /*min_qp=*/30);
60}
61
62absl::optional<LibvpxVp8Decoder::DeblockParams>
63GetPostProcParamsFromFieldTrialGroup() {
64 std::string group = webrtc::field_trial::FindFullName(
65 kIsArm ? kVp8PostProcArmFieldTrial : kVp8PostProcFieldTrial);
66 if (group.empty()) {
67 return DefaultDeblockParams();
68 }
69
70 LibvpxVp8Decoder::DeblockParams params;
71 if (sscanf(group.c_str(), "Enabled-%d,%d,%d", &params.max_level,
72 &params.min_qp, &params.degrade_qp) != 3) {
73 return DefaultDeblockParams();
74 }
75
76 if (params.max_level < 0 || params.max_level > 16) {
77 return DefaultDeblockParams();
78 }
79
80 if (params.min_qp < 0 || params.degrade_qp <= params.min_qp) {
81 return DefaultDeblockParams();
82 }
83
84 return params;
85}
86
87} // namespace
88
89std::unique_ptr<VideoDecoder> VP8Decoder::Create() {
90 return std::make_unique<LibvpxVp8Decoder>();
91}
92
93class LibvpxVp8Decoder::QpSmoother {
94 public:
95 QpSmoother() : last_sample_ms_(rtc::TimeMillis()), smoother_(kAlpha) {}
96
97 int GetAvg() const {
98 float value = smoother_.filtered();
99 return (value == rtc::ExpFilter::kValueUndefined) ? 0
100 : static_cast<int>(value);
101 }
102
103 void Add(float sample) {
104 int64_t now_ms = rtc::TimeMillis();
105 smoother_.Apply(static_cast<float>(now_ms - last_sample_ms_), sample);
106 last_sample_ms_ = now_ms;
107 }
108
109 void Reset() { smoother_.Reset(kAlpha); }
110
111 private:
112 const float kAlpha = 0.95f;
113 int64_t last_sample_ms_;
114 rtc::ExpFilter smoother_;
115};
116
117LibvpxVp8Decoder::LibvpxVp8Decoder()
118 : use_postproc_(
119 kIsArm ? webrtc::field_trial::IsEnabled(kVp8PostProcArmFieldTrial)
120 : true),
121 buffer_pool_(false, 300 /* max_number_of_buffers*/),
122 decode_complete_callback_(NULL),
123 inited_(false),
124 decoder_(NULL),
125 propagation_cnt_(-1),
126 last_frame_width_(0),
127 last_frame_height_(0),
128 key_frame_required_(true),
129 deblock_params_(use_postproc_ ? GetPostProcParamsFromFieldTrialGroup()
130 : absl::nullopt),
131 qp_smoother_(use_postproc_ ? new QpSmoother() : nullptr),
132 preferred_output_format_(field_trial::IsEnabled("WebRTC-NV12Decode")
133 ? VideoFrameBuffer::Type::kNV12
134 : VideoFrameBuffer::Type::kI420) {}
135
136LibvpxVp8Decoder::~LibvpxVp8Decoder() {
137 inited_ = true; // in order to do the actual release
138 Release();
139}
140
141int LibvpxVp8Decoder::InitDecode(const VideoCodec* inst, int number_of_cores) {
142 int ret_val = Release();
143 if (ret_val < 0) {
144 return ret_val;
145 }
146 if (decoder_ == NULL) {
147 decoder_ = new vpx_codec_ctx_t;
148 memset(decoder_, 0, sizeof(*decoder_));
149 }
150 vpx_codec_dec_cfg_t cfg;
151 // Setting number of threads to a constant value (1)
152 cfg.threads = 1;
153 cfg.h = cfg.w = 0; // set after decode
154
155 vpx_codec_flags_t flags = use_postproc_ ? VPX_CODEC_USE_POSTPROC : 0;
156
157 if (vpx_codec_dec_init(decoder_, vpx_codec_vp8_dx(), &cfg, flags)) {
158 delete decoder_;
159 decoder_ = nullptr;
160 return WEBRTC_VIDEO_CODEC_MEMORY;
161 }
162
163 propagation_cnt_ = -1;
164 inited_ = true;
165
166 // Always start with a complete key frame.
167 key_frame_required_ = true;
168 if (inst && inst->buffer_pool_size) {
169 if (!buffer_pool_.Resize(*inst->buffer_pool_size)) {
170 return WEBRTC_VIDEO_CODEC_UNINITIALIZED;
171 }
172 }
173 return WEBRTC_VIDEO_CODEC_OK;
174}
175
176int LibvpxVp8Decoder::Decode(const EncodedImage& input_image,
177 bool missing_frames,
178 int64_t /*render_time_ms*/) {
179 if (!inited_) {
180 return WEBRTC_VIDEO_CODEC_UNINITIALIZED;
181 }
182 if (decode_complete_callback_ == NULL) {
183 return WEBRTC_VIDEO_CODEC_UNINITIALIZED;
184 }
185 if (input_image.data() == NULL && input_image.size() > 0) {
186 // Reset to avoid requesting key frames too often.
187 if (propagation_cnt_ > 0)
188 propagation_cnt_ = 0;
189 return WEBRTC_VIDEO_CODEC_ERR_PARAMETER;
190 }
191
192// Post process configurations.
193 if (use_postproc_) {
194 vp8_postproc_cfg_t ppcfg;
195 // MFQE enabled to reduce key frame popping.
196 ppcfg.post_proc_flag = VP8_MFQE;
197
198 if (kIsArm) {
199 RTC_DCHECK(deblock_params_.has_value());
200 }
201 if (deblock_params_.has_value()) {
202 // For low resolutions, use stronger deblocking filter.
203 int last_width_x_height = last_frame_width_ * last_frame_height_;
204 if (last_width_x_height > 0 && last_width_x_height <= 320 * 240) {
205 // Enable the deblock and demacroblocker based on qp thresholds.
206 RTC_DCHECK(qp_smoother_);
207 int qp = qp_smoother_->GetAvg();
208 if (qp > deblock_params_->min_qp) {
209 int level = deblock_params_->max_level;
210 if (qp < deblock_params_->degrade_qp) {
211 // Use lower level.
212 level = deblock_params_->max_level *
213 (qp - deblock_params_->min_qp) /
214 (deblock_params_->degrade_qp - deblock_params_->min_qp);
215 }
216 // Deblocking level only affects VP8_DEMACROBLOCK.
217 ppcfg.deblocking_level = std::max(level, 1);
218 ppcfg.post_proc_flag |= VP8_DEBLOCK | VP8_DEMACROBLOCK;
219 }
220 }
221 } else {
222 // Non-arm with no explicit deblock params set.
223 ppcfg.post_proc_flag |= VP8_DEBLOCK;
224 // For VGA resolutions and lower, enable the demacroblocker postproc.
225 if (last_frame_width_ * last_frame_height_ <= 640 * 360) {
226 ppcfg.post_proc_flag |= VP8_DEMACROBLOCK;
227 }
228 // Strength of deblocking filter. Valid range:[0,16]
229 ppcfg.deblocking_level = 3;
230 }
231
232 vpx_codec_control(decoder_, VP8_SET_POSTPROC, &ppcfg);
233 }
234
235 // Always start with a complete key frame.
236 if (key_frame_required_) {
237 if (input_image._frameType != VideoFrameType::kVideoFrameKey)
238 return WEBRTC_VIDEO_CODEC_ERROR;
239 key_frame_required_ = false;
240 }
241 // Restrict error propagation using key frame requests.
242 // Reset on a key frame refresh.
243 if (input_image._frameType == VideoFrameType::kVideoFrameKey) {
244 propagation_cnt_ = -1;
245 // Start count on first loss.
246 } else if (missing_frames && propagation_cnt_ == -1) {
247 propagation_cnt_ = 0;
248 }
249 if (propagation_cnt_ >= 0) {
250 propagation_cnt_++;
251 }
252
253 vpx_codec_iter_t iter = NULL;
254 vpx_image_t* img;
255 int ret;
256
257 // Check for missing frames.
258 if (missing_frames) {
259 // Call decoder with zero data length to signal missing frames.
260 if (vpx_codec_decode(decoder_, NULL, 0, 0, kDecodeDeadlineRealtime)) {
261 // Reset to avoid requesting key frames too often.
262 if (propagation_cnt_ > 0)
263 propagation_cnt_ = 0;
264 return WEBRTC_VIDEO_CODEC_ERROR;
265 }
266 img = vpx_codec_get_frame(decoder_, &iter);
267 iter = NULL;
268 }
269
270 const uint8_t* buffer = input_image.data();
271 if (input_image.size() == 0) {
272 buffer = NULL; // Triggers full frame concealment.
273 }
274 if (vpx_codec_decode(decoder_, buffer, input_image.size(), 0,
275 kDecodeDeadlineRealtime)) {
276 // Reset to avoid requesting key frames too often.
277 if (propagation_cnt_ > 0) {
278 propagation_cnt_ = 0;
279 }
280 return WEBRTC_VIDEO_CODEC_ERROR;
281 }
282
283 img = vpx_codec_get_frame(decoder_, &iter);
284 int qp;
285 vpx_codec_err_t vpx_ret =
286 vpx_codec_control(decoder_, VPXD_GET_LAST_QUANTIZER, &qp);
287 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(vpx_ret, VPX_CODEC_OK);
288 ret = ReturnFrame(img, input_image.Timestamp(), qp, input_image.ColorSpace());
289 if (ret != 0) {
290 // Reset to avoid requesting key frames too often.
291 if (ret < 0 && propagation_cnt_ > 0)
292 propagation_cnt_ = 0;
293 return ret;
294 }
295 // Check Vs. threshold
296 if (propagation_cnt_ > kVp8ErrorPropagationTh) {
297 // Reset to avoid requesting key frames too often.
298 propagation_cnt_ = 0;
299 return WEBRTC_VIDEO_CODEC_ERROR;
300 }
301 return WEBRTC_VIDEO_CODEC_OK;
302}
303
304int LibvpxVp8Decoder::ReturnFrame(
305 const vpx_image_t* img,
306 uint32_t timestamp,
307 int qp,
308 const webrtc::ColorSpace* explicit_color_space) {
309 if (img == NULL) {
310 // Decoder OK and NULL image => No show frame
311 return WEBRTC_VIDEO_CODEC_NO_OUTPUT;
312 }
313 if (qp_smoother_) {
314 if (last_frame_width_ != static_cast<int>(img->d_w) ||
315 last_frame_height_ != static_cast<int>(img->d_h)) {
316 qp_smoother_->Reset();
317 }
318 qp_smoother_->Add(qp);
319 }
320 last_frame_width_ = img->d_w;
321 last_frame_height_ = img->d_h;
322 // Allocate memory for decoded image.
323 rtc::scoped_refptr<VideoFrameBuffer> buffer;
324
325 if (preferred_output_format_ == VideoFrameBuffer::Type::kNV12) {
326 // Convert instead of making a copy.
327 // Note: libvpx doesn't support creating NV12 image directly.
328 // Due to the bitstream structure such a change would just hide the
329 // conversion operation inside the decode call.
330 rtc::scoped_refptr<NV12Buffer> nv12_buffer =
331 buffer_pool_.CreateNV12Buffer(img->d_w, img->d_h);
332 buffer = nv12_buffer;
333 if (nv12_buffer.get()) {
334 libyuv::I420ToNV12(img->planes[VPX_PLANE_Y], img->stride[VPX_PLANE_Y],
335 img->planes[VPX_PLANE_U], img->stride[VPX_PLANE_U],
336 img->planes[VPX_PLANE_V], img->stride[VPX_PLANE_V],
337 nv12_buffer->MutableDataY(), nv12_buffer->StrideY(),
338 nv12_buffer->MutableDataUV(), nv12_buffer->StrideUV(),
339 img->d_w, img->d_h);
340 }
341 } else {
342 rtc::scoped_refptr<I420Buffer> i420_buffer =
343 buffer_pool_.CreateI420Buffer(img->d_w, img->d_h);
344 buffer = i420_buffer;
345 if (i420_buffer.get()) {
346 libyuv::I420Copy(img->planes[VPX_PLANE_Y], img->stride[VPX_PLANE_Y],
347 img->planes[VPX_PLANE_U], img->stride[VPX_PLANE_U],
348 img->planes[VPX_PLANE_V], img->stride[VPX_PLANE_V],
349 i420_buffer->MutableDataY(), i420_buffer->StrideY(),
350 i420_buffer->MutableDataU(), i420_buffer->StrideU(),
351 i420_buffer->MutableDataV(), i420_buffer->StrideV(),
352 img->d_w, img->d_h);
353 }
354 }
355
356 if (!buffer.get()) {
357 // Pool has too many pending frames.
358 RTC_HISTOGRAM_BOOLEAN("WebRTC.Video.LibvpxVp8Decoder.TooManyPendingFrames",
359 1);
360 return WEBRTC_VIDEO_CODEC_NO_OUTPUT;
361 }
362
363 VideoFrame decoded_image = VideoFrame::Builder()
364 .set_video_frame_buffer(buffer)
365 .set_timestamp_rtp(timestamp)
366 .set_color_space(explicit_color_space)
367 .build();
368 decode_complete_callback_->Decoded(decoded_image, absl::nullopt, qp);
369
370 return WEBRTC_VIDEO_CODEC_OK;
371}
372
373int LibvpxVp8Decoder::RegisterDecodeCompleteCallback(
374 DecodedImageCallback* callback) {
375 decode_complete_callback_ = callback;
376 return WEBRTC_VIDEO_CODEC_OK;
377}
378
379int LibvpxVp8Decoder::Release() {
380 int ret_val = WEBRTC_VIDEO_CODEC_OK;
381
382 if (decoder_ != NULL) {
383 if (inited_) {
384 if (vpx_codec_destroy(decoder_)) {
385 ret_val = WEBRTC_VIDEO_CODEC_MEMORY;
386 }
387 }
388 delete decoder_;
389 decoder_ = NULL;
390 }
391 buffer_pool_.Release();
392 inited_ = false;
393 return ret_val;
394}
395
396VideoDecoder::DecoderInfo LibvpxVp8Decoder::GetDecoderInfo() const {
397 DecoderInfo info;
398 info.implementation_name = "libvpx";
399 info.is_hardware_accelerated = false;
400 return info;
401}
402
403const char* LibvpxVp8Decoder::ImplementationName() const {
404 return "libvpx";
405}
